includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: 97 years after a nuclear apocalypse, with humans now living in space, 100 juvenile delinquents are sent to Earth to see if it's inhabitable.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: 97 years after a nuclear apocalypse, with humans now living in space, 100 juvenile delinquents are sent to Earth to see if it's inhabitable.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: 97 years after a nuclear apocalypse, with humans now living in space, 100 juvenile delinquents are sent to Earth to see if it's inhabitable.

includedAssets.title: Earth Skills
includedAssets.synopsis: The group make a shocking discovery as they go in search of Jasper, while Abby fights to prove Earth is inhabitable.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The group make a shocking discovery as they go in search of Jasper, while Abby fights to prove Earth is inhabitable.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The group make a shocking discovery as they go in search of Jasper, while Abby fights to prove Earth is inhabitable.

includedAssets.title: Earth Kills
includedAssets.synopsis: Bellamy leads a hunting party, while Clarke, Finn and Wells try to help Jasper. Meanwhile, an acidic fog heads for the group.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bellamy leads a hunting party, while Clarke, Finn and Wells try to help Jasper. Meanwhile, an acidic fog heads for the group.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bellamy leads a hunting party, while Clarke, Finn and Wells try to help Jasper. Meanwhile, an acidic fog heads for the group.

includedAssets.title: Murphy's Law
includedAssets.synopsis: Charlotte's safety comes under threat as everyone learns who killed Wells. Meanwhile, Clarke and Finn grow closer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Charlotte's safety comes under threat as everyone learns who killed Wells. Meanwhile, Clarke and Finn grow closer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Charlotte's safety comes under threat as everyone learns who killed Wells. Meanwhile, Clarke and Finn grow closer.

includedAssets.title: Twilight's Last Gleaming
includedAssets.synopsis: Abby exposes Kane, the group gets a new member and Clarke and Finn's relationship comes under threat.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Abby exposes Kane, the group gets a new member and Clarke and Finn's relationship comes under threat.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Abby exposes Kane, the group gets a new member and Clarke and Finn's relationship comes under threat.
includedAssets.guidanceText: strong language, mature themes, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: His Sister's Keeper
includedAssets.synopsis: Bellamy, Finn and Jasper go in search of Octavia, while Raven notices something between Finn and Clarke.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bellamy, Finn and Jasper go in search of Octavia, while Raven notices something between Finn and Clarke.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bellamy, Finn and Jasper go in search of Octavia, while Raven notices something between Finn and Clarke.

includedAssets.title: Contents Under Pressure
includedAssets.synopsis: After Clark and Raven make contact with the Ark, Abby attempts to help Clarke save Finn.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After Clark and Raven make contact with the Ark, Abby attempts to help Clarke save Finn.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After Clark and Raven make contact with the Ark, Abby attempts to help Clarke save Finn.

includedAssets.title: Day Trip
includedAssets.synopsis: Clarke and Bellamy grow closer as they search for a rumoured stash of supplies that could be key to the group's survival.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Clarke and Bellamy grow closer as they search for a rumoured stash of supplies that could be key to the group's survival.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Clarke and Bellamy grow closer as they search for a rumoured stash of supplies that could be key to the group's survival.

includedAssets.title: Unity Day
includedAssets.synopsis: Finn's good intentions lead to a tense situation as he tries to bring the Grounders and Clarke together to find peace.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Finn's good intentions lead to a tense situation as he tries to bring the Grounders and Clarke together to find peace.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Finn's good intentions lead to a tense situation as he tries to bring the Grounders and Clarke together to find peace.

includedAssets.title: I Am Become Death
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep10 - I Am Become Death
includedAssets.synopsis: Bellamy, Finn and Raven are forced to think quickly as the Grounders attempt to weaken the camp from the inside.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bellamy, Finn and Raven are forced to think quickly as the Grounders attempt to weaken the camp from the inside.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bellamy, Finn and Raven are forced to think quickly as the Grounders attempt to weaken the camp from the inside.

includedAssets.title: The Calm
includedAssets.synopsis: As the camp begins to run low on food, Clarke and Finn try to find a solution, throwing themselves into a deadly situation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the camp begins to run low on food, Clarke and Finn try to find a solution, throwing themselves into a deadly situation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the camp begins to run low on food, Clarke and Finn try to find a solution, throwing themselves into a deadly situation.

includedAssets.title: We Are Grounders - Part I
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep12 - We Are Grounders - Part I
includedAssets.synopsis: Clarke and Finn come face-to-face with a new enemy, Bellamy tries to save Jasper and Murphy looks for revenge.
